engChrName: Here you go. Brought the goods.
engSearchText: Here you go. Brought the goods.
jpnChrName: ほらよ、コイツが指定のブツだ。
jpnSearchText: ほらよ、コイツが指定のブツだ。

engChrName: Wasn't easy to find this, you know. Went around every damn antique shop in the capital before we came across it.
engSearchText:
Wasn't easy to find this, you know. Went around
every damn antique shop in the capital before we
came across it.
jpnChrName: 苦労したんだぜぇ～？ 首都中の古物屋を当たってよぉ。
jpnSearchText:
苦労したんだぜぇ～？
首都中の古物屋を当たってよぉ。

engChrName: Yeah, and now my legs hurt like a bitch for it. Gonna hurt somethin' fierce tomorrow.
engSearchText:
Yeah, and now my legs hurt like a bitch for it.
Gonna hurt somethin' fierce tomorrow.
jpnChrName: おかげで足が棒になっちまった。 あー、明日は筋肉痛だぜ。
jpnSearchText:
おかげで足が棒になっちまった。
あー、明日は筋肉痛だぜ。

engChrName: Well earned, I'm sure.
engSearchText: Well earned, I'm sure.
jpnChrName: ご苦労だったな。
jpnSearchText: ご苦労だったな。

engChrName: Open the case so we can confirm its contents, then.
engSearchText: Open the case so we can confirm its contents, then.
jpnChrName: 一応、中を見せてもらおうか。
jpnSearchText: 一応、中を見せてもらおうか。

engChrName: ...This does appear to be what the bosses asked for.
engSearchText: ...This does appear to be what the bosses asked for.
jpnChrName: ………ボスたちの指定通りか。
jpnSearchText: ………ボスたちの指定通りか。

engChrName: It looks authentic to me, too.
engSearchText: It looks authentic to me, too.
jpnChrName: その造り、贋作（フェイク）でも無さそうだ。
jpnSearchText: その造り、贋作（フェイク）でも無さそうだ。

engChrName: Ohh, this ain't no knockoff. It's the real thing!
engSearchText: Ohh, this ain't no knockoff. It's the real thing!
jpnChrName: おお、正真正銘の指定のブツだ！
jpnSearchText: おお、正真正銘の指定のブツだ！

engChrName: So, we good for a million?
engSearchText: So, we good for a million?
jpnChrName: 合わせて１００万ミラ、 耳を揃えて払ってもらおうか！？
jpnSearchText:
合わせて１００万ミラ、
耳を揃えて払ってもらおうか！？

engChrName: And where did you pull that figure from?
engSearchText: And where did you pull that figure from?
jpnChrName: ふむ、それはおかしな話だな。
jpnSearchText: ふむ、それはおかしな話だな。

engChrName: I believe we agreed on 100,000 mira down and 300,000 more upon completion of the job.
engSearchText:
I believe we agreed on 100,000 mira down and
300,000 more upon completion of the job.
jpnChrName: 前金１０万、成功報酬３０万の筈だが？
jpnSearchText: 前金１０万、成功報酬３０万の筈だが？

engChrName: Yeah, well, that was then, and this is now. Inflation ain't pretty, you feel me?
engSearchText:
Yeah, well, that was then, and this is now.
Inflation ain't pretty, you feel me?
jpnChrName: こーいうのは時価でしょ、時価。
jpnSearchText: こーいうのは時価でしょ、時価。

engChrName: Doesn't sound very fair that we busted our asses for somethin' so important only for a little loose change.
engSearchText:
Doesn't sound very fair that we busted our asses for
somethin' so important only for a little loose change.
jpnChrName: よっぽど大切なモノみたいだしぃ～、 ボクたちの努力にも色付けて頂戴よぉ？
jpnSearchText:
よっぽど大切なモノみたいだしぃ～、
ボクたちの努力にも色付けて頂戴よぉ？

engChrName: And there's a lotta rumors going 'round 'bout you guys.
engSearchText:
And there's a lotta rumors going 'round 'bout
you guys.
jpnChrName: アンタらの噂は色々聞いてるぜ。
jpnSearchText: アンタらの噂は色々聞いてるぜ。

engChrName: How 'bout it? You treat us right, and this could be the start of somethin' real nice here.
engSearchText:
How 'bout it? You treat us right, and this could be the
start of somethin' real nice here.
jpnChrName: 今後も協力できるかもしれねぇし、 お近づきの印ってことでどうだよ？
jpnSearchText:
今後も協力できるかもしれねぇし、
お近づきの印ってことでどうだよ？

engChrName: Heh. Interesting.
engSearchText: Heh. Interesting.
jpnChrName: フフ、なるほどな。
jpnSearchText: フフ、なるほどな。

engChrName: I suppose you do deserve a little extra something.
engSearchText: I suppose you do deserve a little extra something.
jpnChrName: だったら── もっと良いものをくれてやろうか？
jpnSearchText:
だったら──
もっと良いものをくれてやろうか？

engChrName: The hell?!
engSearchText: The hell?!
jpnChrName: てめぇら……！
jpnSearchText: てめぇら……！

engChrName: You gotta be kiddin' me!
engSearchText: You gotta be kiddin' me!
jpnChrName: や、やるってのかぁ～っ！？
jpnSearchText: や、やるってのかぁ～っ！？

engChrName: Hgh!
engSearchText: Hgh!
jpnSearchText: ぐっ……！？

engChrName: Oh, you think we won't play?!
engSearchText: Oh, you think we won't play?!
jpnChrName: 上等だコラアアア！！
jpnSearchText: 上等だコラアアア！！

engChrName: E-Eeek!
engSearchText: E-Eeek!
jpnChrName: ひ、ひいいいっ！？
jpnSearchText: ひ、ひいいいっ！？

engChrName: Wh-What is this...?
engSearchText: Wh-What is this...?
jpnChrName: て、てめえら……
jpnSearchText: て、てめえら……

engChrName: Hmph. Should've known your place.
engSearchText: Hmph. Should've known your place.
jpnChrName: フン、半グレ風情が。
jpnSearchText: フン、半グレ風情が。

engChrName: Word to the wise: don't try to blackmail someone higher up on the food chain.
engSearchText:
Word to the wise: don't try to blackmail someone
higher up on the food chain.
jpnChrName: たかりは相手を見てするがいい。
jpnSearchText: たかりは相手を見てするがいい。

engChrName: Damn it! The cops!
engSearchText: Damn it! The cops!
jpnChrName: なっ……ポリか！？
jpnSearchText: なっ……ポリか！？

engChrName: When did they start patrolling down here?!
engSearchText: When did they start patrolling down here?!
jpnChrName: まさか──巡回かよぉっ！？
jpnSearchText: まさか──巡回かよぉっ！？

engChrName: Idiots. Must have been on your tail.
engSearchText: Idiots. Must have been on your tail.
jpnChrName: チッ…… お前たち、嗅ぎつけられたな？
jpnSearchText:
チッ……
お前たち、嗅ぎつけられたな？

engChrName: Let's just get out of—wh-what?
engSearchText: Let's just get out of—wh-what?
jpnChrName: まあいい、とっとと──
jpnSearchText: まあいい、とっとと──

engChrName: Where'd it go?
engSearchText: Where'd it go?
jpnChrName: いつの間に……
jpnSearchText: いつの間に……

engChrName: I-I don't know any better than you!
engSearchText: I-I don't know any better than you!
jpnChrName: ど、どこに消えやがった！？
jpnSearchText: ど、どこに消えやがった！？

engChrName: What are you doing down here?!
engSearchText: What are you doing down here?!
jpnChrName: お前たち、何をしている！？
jpnSearchText: お前たち、何をしている！？

engChrName: Tch.
engSearchText: Tch.
jpnChrName: チッ……
jpnSearchText: チッ……

engChrName: We're done. Let's scram.
engSearchText: We're done. Let's scram.
jpnChrName: 仕方ない、一旦離脱する。
jpnSearchText: 仕方ない、一旦離脱する。

engChrName: We ain't gonna wait around to get busted, neither!
engSearchText: We ain't gonna wait around to get busted, neither!
jpnChrName: クソッ、俺らもズラかるぞ！！
jpnSearchText: クソッ、俺らもズラかるぞ！！

engChrName: Th-This wasn't how it was supposed to go!
engSearchText: Th-This wasn't how it was supposed to go!
jpnChrName: な、なんだってんだよぉお～！？
jpnSearchText: な、なんだってんだよぉお～！？

engChrName: Suspects in sight!
engSearchText: Suspects in sight!
jpnChrName: 不審集団を発見！
jpnSearchText: 不審集団を発見！

engChrName: Seems that tip paid off. Apprehend them!
engSearchText: Seems that tip paid off. Apprehend them!
jpnChrName: 通報の半グレどもだ、捕まえろ！
jpnSearchText: 通報の半グレどもだ、捕まえろ！

engChrName: Heh. Even those dumbasses in the police force have their uses once in a while.
engSearchText:
Heh. Even those dumbasses in the police force have
their uses once in a while.
jpnChrName: クク……ボンクラの 首都警察にしちゃ上出来だぜ。
jpnSearchText:
クク……ボンクラの
首都警察にしちゃ上出来だぜ。

engChrName: Thing's gotta be worth a shitton of mira if A wants it that bad.
engSearchText:
Thing's gotta be worth a shitton of mira if A wants it
that bad.
jpnChrName: 《Ａ》が捜してるっつうブツ、 ミラの匂いがプンプンしやがるぜ。
jpnSearchText:
《Ａ》が捜してるっつうブツ、
ミラの匂いがプンプンしやがるぜ。

engChrName: Guess I should check the Blacklight District—or maybe 'there' would be a better place to start.
engSearchText:
Guess I should check the Blacklight District—or
maybe 'there' would be a better place to start.
jpnChrName: 黒芒街──いや、 あっちのヤサで調べてみるか。
jpnSearchText:
黒芒街──いや、
あっちのヤサで調べてみるか。
